about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Chrono Stone is a semi-automatic Roguelike RPG. Assemble a team, create unique skill builds, and craft powerful gear. As the commander, you’ll devise sound battle strategies and give timely commands to help your squad dodge danger, turning the tide to defeat powerful monsters and opponents.

Choose a Different Adventure

Each time you embark, the composition of the world changes. You will encounter different events, face various bosses, acquire a variety of powerful equipment, and learn unique skills. Some rewards come with risks, and may even require a painful cost. Every decision is crucial, and luck is also a part of strength.

Build Different Teams

The game features no fixed classes. Acquire a variety of skills during your adventures, combine them with equipment that has various random attributes, and create completely different team compositions for a unique gaming experience.

Battle Modes

  • Tactical Arrangement：Before the battle begins, you need to cleverly arrange tactics based on the enemies and the form of the battle. Develop the right skill-casting strategy for different heroes.

  • Auto-Battle：Although heroes obey your commands, their minds are straightforward. Once the battle starts, they will carry out the strategy you've set.

  • Real-time Command：During battles, players can't control heroes in real-time, but they can use command abilities at the right moment to adjust the team's formation or focus on a target, turning the tide at crucial moments.

  • Time Stop Command：When heroes are in chaos, and commands are in disarray, in moments when the battlefield is uncontrollable, activate time stop for urgent strategic adjustments. Be a commander in frozen time, and never worry about heroes going astray again.
